text: 7.15 Lom 12.18, 14.19, Hib 12.14 Bɨ bel omɨŋal pen dɨl mɨdebil okok, nɨgɨmɨl nep Klays nop gos lɨnɨgup ak, bin ne Klays nop gos ma lɨnɨŋɨd, kɨles gɨl nɨgɨmɨl nop kelɨg amnɨg gonɨmuŋ, yaw agek amnɨmuŋ. Pen bin Klays nop gos lɨnɨgup ak, bɨne Klays nop gos ma lɨnɨŋɨd, kɨles gɨl bin nop kelɨg amnɨg gonɨmuŋ, yaw agek amnɨmuŋ. Bin yad agɨl, bɨyad agɨl ma dɨ tɨbɨkɨnɨmɨb. God ne nɨbi kɨmɨgel mɨdtep gɨnɨmɨb agɨl nɨbop aglup, anɨb ak kɨlop kelɨgem amnɨgel.
